name: The Ravenous Adventure Of Raven
description:
The Ravenous Adventure Of Raven is a very short game I made for a college assignment. If you happen to stumble upon this excuse of a game and you aren't my lecturer I would like to apologise for any pain and suffering that this game may have caused or will cause to you.

The collision is also terrible. This is Unity's fault. I hate Unity. This 'game' will be released in the future in another game that I am currently making in Unreal Engine. Trust me, it's far better than this shit.
